mapper.select: select employees.username as username, taxID, salary, hired, employees.experience as employee_experience, IFNULL(licenseID, 'n/a') as licenseID, IFNULL(pilots.experience, 'n/a') as piloting_experience, IF(manager IS NULL, 'no' , 'yes') as manager_status from employees left join pilots on employees.username = pilots.username left join delivery_services on manager = employees.username;
